-1.title: Have a Magickal Christmas!

episode of.title: TotalBiscuit and The Yogscast 'play' Magicka (TV Mini-Series 2011)

-1.plot: The return of the most popular collab gaming series in internet history. TotalBiscuit and The Yogscast demonstrate their ineptitude in Arrowhead's Mage Suicide Simulator, Magicka.

1.title: You're a Wizard Simon

episode of.title: TotalBiscuit and The Yogscast 'play' Magicka (TV Mini-Series 2011)

1.plot: Magicka released in a sadly buggy state, but now it would seem quite playable over the Internet. Simon, Lewis, and TotalBiscuit begin an epic adventure of great peril and heroism through the mystical land of Ohwhogivesadamn.

2.title: Let Jesus into your ARGH

episode of.title: TotalBiscuit and The Yogscast 'play' Magicka (TV Mini-Series 2011)

2.plot: The Almighty Biscuit and Simon and Lewis continue their quest to save the land of Magicka from the evil that is clouding the skies.

14.plot: Recorded literally 2 months ago, TotalBiscuit found this old recording on his hard drive, so it's now here for your viewing pleasure as a special Sunday bonus.
